Hi all - 

Just a short note before heading down the road to Tampa. Besides a few swords and fittings, I'm bringing most of the books I bought several months ago. I never did follow-up on peddling these via Ebay. If you're looking for any books, stop by and have a look. Books are HEAVY so this is a chance to save shipping/insurance plus...I sure don't look forward to lugging them back home again! Check out my table. I take (good) checks and of course, cash! Seriously, there are some good titles that I'll have there. 

Ron
STL
